cz.cvut.fel.kinclma1.player

Class MusicStringPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cvut.fel.kinclma1.player.MusicStringPlayer

  • public class MusicStringPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class for the customised JFugue Player class, which is a controller between the player and the PlayerListeners

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MusicStringPlayer(java.lang.String musicString, java.util.List<PlayerListener> listeners)
      Creates a new player for the given music string and registers and informs the given PlayerListeners
      MusicStringPlayer(java.lang.String musicString, PlayerListener listener)
      Creates a new player for the given music string and registers and informs the given PlayerListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(PlayerListener listener)
      Registers an additional PlayerListener
      void close()
      Cancels everything concerning the player and notifies listeners to close
      void pause()
      Pauses the playback
      void play()
      Starts/resumes the playback
      void removeListener(PlayerListener listener)
      Removes the given PlayerListeners from the list of listeners
      void setPosition(int seconds)
      Sets the position of the playback in seconds from the start of the sequence
      void stop()
      Stops the playback

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MusicStringPlayer

        public MusicStringPlayer(java.lang.String musicString,
                 java.util.List<PlayerListener> listeners)
        Creates a new player for the given music string and registers and informs the given PlayerListeners
        Parameters:
        musicString - The music string to be played
        listeners - List of the PlayerListeners to be interacting with the player

                 PlayerListener listener)

        Parameters:

        listener - PlayerListener to be interacting with the player
